attributes.action: Lift the ban on the Pit Bull Terrier, Japanese Tosa, Dogo Argentino and the Fila Braziliero.
attributes.additional_details: These breeds of dog are banned in the UK because they are deemed too aggressive. No dog is born with an aggression issue its how we raise them, dogs are like children; no one says we should put down dangerous humans so why do we do it to poorly raised dogs???
